presets.description: Choose a preset to quickly configure your Starship prompt. Your current configuration will be backed up automatically.

character.name: Character
character.title: Character Module
character.subtitle: Configure the prompt character that appears at the beginning of your prompt.
character.hideDescription: Hide the character module from your prompt
character.successSymbolDesc: Symbol shown when the previous command succeeded
character.errorSymbolDesc: Symbol shown when the previous command failed
character.vimcmdSymbolDesc: Symbol shown in vim normal mode
character.vimcmdReplaceSymbolDesc: Symbol shown in vim replace mode
character.vimcmdVisualSymbolDesc: Symbol shown in vim visual mode

directory.name: Directory
directory.title: Directory Module
directory.subtitle: Configure how the current directory path is displayed in your prompt.
directory.hideDescription: Hide the directory module from your prompt
directory.truncationLengthDesc: Number of parent directories to show
directory.truncationSymbolDesc: Symbol used to indicate truncated paths
directory.truncateToRepoDesc: Truncate to the root of the git repository
directory.formatDesc: Format string for the directory display
directory.homeSymbolDesc: Symbol used to represent the home directory

git.name: Git
git.title: Git Module
git.subtitle: Configure how git information is displayed in your prompt.

branch.hideDesc: Hide git branch from your prompt

status.hideDesc: Hide git status from your prompt

time.name: Time
time.title: Time Module
time.subtitle: Configure the time display in your prompt.
time.hideDescription: The time module is disabled by default. Enable it to show the current time.
time.timeFormatDesc: Format string using strftime syntax. Common formats:
time.displayFormatDesc: Format string for the time display. Use $time for the formatted time.
time.styleDesc: Style for the time display (e.g., bold yellow, #ff0000)

languages.name: Languages
languages.title: Language Modules
languages.subtitle: Configure how programming language versions are displayed in your prompt.
languages.styleDesc: Style for the module (e.g., bold green, #ff0000)
languages.formatDesc: Format string for the module display
languages.versionFormatDesc: Format string for the version number
